text: Michael Hugh Medwin OBE (18 July 1923 - 26 February 2020) was an English actor and movie producer. His best known roles were in Shoestring, Scrooge and in The Army Game. Medwin was born on 18 July 1923 in London, England. He studied at Canford School and at the Institute Fischer. Medwin retired in 2008. He died on 26 February 2020, aged 96.Michael Medwin: Shoestring actor dies aged 96 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English movie producers Category:Actors from London
title: Michael Medwin
